name: Mission 101 - A Space Game
description:
You're on a mission on a foreign planet. Pass both terminals safely and make it home safe! The aliens have made it so that you won't be notified of a loss in lives so keep an eye on the rescue meter in the top right!

Credits:

Rohan Dodda (Lead Director, Producer, Backend, and Frontend Programmer) 

Ariana Beckford (Reviewer and Sprite Distributor)

Bruck Gebre (Tester)
